languages.text: "Я видела ее насквозь. Каждое ее преступление, каждую нечистую мысль. Прозрела это зерно скверны, что она носила на груди — нечестивый обет и гарант обещаний, данных ей слугами Архиврага. Да, я знала... Почувствовала, стоило мне взглянуть на эту старую сквернавку".

"I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."
languages.original_text: "Я видела ее насквозь. Каждое ее преступление, каждую нечистую мысль. Прозрела это зерно скверны, что она носила на груди — нечестивый обет и гарант обещаний, данных ей слугами Архиврага. Да, я знала... Почувствовала, стоило мне взглянуть на эту старую сквернавку".

traits.locale_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I gleaned that seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon this corrupt old wretch."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: “我看穿了她的灵魂，她的一切罪行，她每个肮脏的想法。我看到了她胸前那颗腐化的种子。那是邪恶的誓言，是混沌大敌的仆从给她的承诺。没错，我早就知道……我刚一看到那个堕落的老混账的时候，我就感觉到了。”
languages.original_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."

traits.locale_text: “我看穿了她的灵魂，她的一切罪行，她每个肮脏的想法。我看到了她胸前那颗腐化的种子。那是邪恶的誓言，是混沌大敌的仆从给她的承诺。没错，我早就知道……我刚一看到那个堕落的老混账的时候，我就感觉到了。”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: 「彼女の事は全てお見通しだ。犯した罪全て、感情全て。彼女が胸に着けていた堕落の種を察知した。渾沌の勢力の手下が彼女に与えた約束の担保であり、邪悪な誓いである。すべて知っていたのだよ…この腐敗した老いぼれを見た瞬間から、すべて分かっていた」
languages.original_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の事は全てお見通しだ。犯した罪全て、感情全て。彼女が胸に着けていた堕落の種を察知した。渾沌の勢力の手下が彼女に与えた約束の担保であり、邪悪な誓いである。すべて知っていたのだよ…この腐敗した老いぼれを見た瞬間から、すべて分かっていた」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: «Vi a través de ella. Cada uno de sus crímenes. Cada uno de sus pensamientos contaminados. Percibí esa semilla de corrupción que llevaba en el pecho, un voto impío y la garantía de las promesas que le hicieron los sirvientes del archienemigo. Sí, lo sabía... Lo intuí en el mismo momento en que puse mis ojos en esa vieja corrupta».
languages.original_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."

traits.locale_text: «Vi a través de ella. Cada uno de sus crímenes. Cada uno de sus pensamientos contaminados. Recogí esa semilla de corrupción que llevaba en el pecho, un voto impío y la garantía de las promesas que le hicieron los sirvientes del archienemigo. Sí, lo sabía... Lo intuí en el mismo momento en que puse mis ojos en esa vieja corrupta».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Ich habe sie durchschaut. Jedes ihrer Verbrechen. Jeden ihrer vergifteten Gedanken. Ich habe die Saat der Verderbnis erkannt, die sie auf ihrer Brust getragen hat: einen unheiligen Eid und Pfand für die Versprechen, welche die Diener des Erzfeinds ihr gegeben haben. Ja, ich wusste es ... Ich habe es in dem Augenblick gespürt, in dem ich diese verdorbene alte Hexe das erste Mal erblickt habe."
languages.original_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sie durchschaut. Jedes ihrer Verbrechen. Jeden ihrer vergifteten Gedanken. Ich habe die Saat der Verderbnis erkannt, die sie auf ihrer Brust getragen hat: einen unheiligen Eid und Pfand für die Versprechen, welche die Diener des Erzfeinds ihr gegeben haben. Ja, ich wusste es ... Ich habe es in dem Augenblick gespürt, in dem ich diese verdorbene alte Hexe das erste Mal erblickt habe."
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: « Je l'ai immédiatement percée à jour. J'ai vu chacun de ses crimes, chacune de ses pensées corrompues. J'ai perçu la présence de cette graine de corruption qu'elle portait sur la poitrine : un serment impie constituant une garantie des promesses que lui avaient faites les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi. Oui, je le savais... Je l'ai su dès que j'ai posé les yeux sur cette vieille vipère corrompue. »
languages.original_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ai immédiatement percée à jour. J'ai vu chacun de ses crimes, chacune de ses pensées corrompues. J'ai senti la présence de cette graine de corruption qu'elle portait sur la poitrine : un serment impie constituant une garantie des promesses que lui avaient faites les serviteurs du Grand Ennemi. Oui, je le savais... Je l'ai su dès que j'ai posé les yeux sur cette vieille vipère corrompue. »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: "Gerçek niyetini gördüm. Tüm suçlarını gördüm. Tüm kirli düşüncelerini gördüm. Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârları tarafından ona din dışı yemininin karşılığı olarak verilen mükafatı, göğsünün içinde taşıdığı yozlaşma tohumunu algıladım. Evet, biliyordum. O yozlaşmış, alçak ihtiyara bakar bakmaz hissetmiştim."
languages.original_text: "I saw right through her. Her every crime. Her every tainted thought. I perceived the seed of corruption she was wearing on her chest: an unholy vow and collateral for the promises given to her by servants of the Archenemy. Yes, I knew... I sensed it the moment I looked upon the corrupt old wretch."

traits.locale_text: "Gerçek niyetini gördüm. Tüm suçlarını gördüm. Tüm kirli düşüncelerini gördüm. Şerbaşı'nın hizmetkârları tarafından ona din dışı yemininin karşılığı olarak verilen mükafatı, göğsünün içinde taşıdığı yozlaşma tohumunu algıladım. Evet, biliyordum. O yozlaşmış ihtiyar alçağa bakar bakmaz hissetmiştim."
traits.speaker: Chorda
